title: "Breaking the Ice with AI: Flirtini's Tool Boosts Response Rates and Fuels Uptick in App Chats"
excerpt: "Since introducing a suite of AI tools last month, which includes an AI icebreaker generator tool, 10% of Flirtini's users are using AI to craft an icebreaker for them instead of doing it themselves. This is leading to a 15% increase in replies to first messages, and an 8.81% overall increase in chats on the app."
